text: (ebævin) kavurun (viniścaya kālayehi) allāhgē hamu vīma boru karannōda, ovun niyata vaśayenma parājitayin bavaṭa patva giyaha. (balāporottu novū andamaṭa) hadisiyē ovunṭa viniścaya kālaya pæmiṇiyahot, ovun tamangē pāpayanhi bara tamangē piṭa konda mata osavā gat aya vaśayen “meya (mema dinaya) api viśvāsa nokaḷa (værædden) apaṭa ætivū śōkaya!” yayi edāḍavannāha. ovun osavāgena æti dæya itāmat napuru ēvā noveda
